title: A declaration of suche true articles as George Ioye hath gone about to confute as false
author: Gardiner, Stephen, 1483?-1555.
publisher: In Aldersgate strete by Iohannes Herforde, at the costes and charges of Robert Toye, dwellyng in Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bell],
notes: Foreword signed: Steuen Bysshop of wynchester, i.e. Stephen Gardiner.
A reply to: Joye, George.  George Joye confuteth, Winchesters false articles.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
